Here we'll document all changes added to versions, from first CRAN published version.

## v 2.0.0 (2020-12-17)

* Changed function name `computePGS` to `rapidopgs_single`.
* Dropped the requirement for MAF for case-control traits in `rapidopgs_single`.
* Added a parameter to select type of trait in `rapidopgs-single`.
* Added `rapidopgs_multi` function, which applies SuSiE method to PGS computing.
* Added `susieR` as a dependency.
* Added `Create_1000G`, which automatically download and sets up a reference panel for `rapidopgs_multi` from 1000 Genomes Phase III.
* Added `sd.prior.est` function to use heritability estimates to create an informed SD prior.



## v1.0.2 (2020-08-03)

This is first version submitted to CRAN. It contains basic functions for what we later called "RápidoPGS-single" approach.
